means: 哥白尼学说的，哥白尼的

sentence.Network_en: The field has enjoyed its own quiet Copernican revolution in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几年,该领域独自安静地经历了哥白尼式的改革.

sentence.Network_en: Yet a couple of centuries later, Copernican advocates seemed harmless.
sentence.Network_cn: 但几个世纪后, 哥白尼的拥护者显然不会受到伤害.

sentence.Network_en: The authority for this new Copernican revolution derives, as of the old, from hard scientific evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次新的哥白尼式的解放, 其真实性依旧来自于确凿的科学证据.

sentences.sentence: "in the Copernican system the earth and other planets revolve around the sun"

auth_sentence.content: His entire "Copernican Principle" argument is specious.
auth_sentence.res_content: His entire "Copernican Principle" argument is specious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His entire "Copernican Principle" argument is specious.

auth_sentence.content: He was also forced to publicly withdraw his support for Copernican theory.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was also forced to publicly withdraw his support for Copernican theory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was also forced to publicly withdraw his support for Copernican theory.

auth_sentence.content: He became an ever more convinced Copernican, but he had his crotchets.
auth_sentence.res_content: He became an ever more convinced Copernican, but he had his crotchets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He became an ever more convinced Copernican, but he had his crotchets.
